text:
@realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews Assume herd immunity with only 70% infected.
That’s >231,000,000 Americans have to get the coronavirus. 
If 1% of die, that 2,310,000. 
If 20% get hospitalized: that’s 46,200,000 people admitted and left permanently partially disabled.
We MUST vote #DonaldMort out of office.
